long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The 9M2PJU Dipole Antenna Calculator is an essential tool for amateur radio operators, allowing you to calculate the ideal dipole antenna lengths based on frequency and velocity factor. Whether you're a seasoned expert or just getting started in the world of amateur radio, this user-friendly extension provides accurate calculations to enhance your antenna performance.

If you enjoy using this extension and would like to support its development, consider buying me a coffee! https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/9m2pju 

Key Features:

Frequency Input: Easily enter the frequency in MHz to get precise dipole length calculations.
Velocity Factor Options: Choose from common wire types (Bare Copper, Insulated, Stranded) or enter a custom value to fit your specific needs.
Multiple Output Units: Select your preferred units of measurement, including meters, feet, and inches.
Clear Results Display: Instant results with total dipole length and individual leg lengths, along with quarter-wave measurements.
Sleek, Modern Design: Enjoy an intuitive interface with a sleek look that fits perfectly into your workflow.

Why Choose Us? Designed by amateur radio enthusiasts for enthusiasts, the 9M2PJU Dipole Antenna Calculator takes the guesswork out of antenna design. Make informed decisions for your next project and improve your radio communication capabilities!

Get Started Now! Download the extension and transform the way you calculate dipole antennas.
